src/xcapek.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001     template <class T, class D>
00002     double xcapek(const std::vector<T>& objects, D dmetric, size_t max_k, size_t dimensionality,
00003                   std::vector<T> *medoids = NULL) 
00004     {
00005       int size, rank;
00006       CMPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00007       CMPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00008 
00009       seed_random_uniform(comm); // seed RN generator uniformly across ranks.
00010 
00011       // fix things if k is greater than the number of elements, since we can't 
00012       // ever find that many clusters.
00013       size_t num_objects = size * objects.size();
00014       max_k = std::min(num_objects, max_k);
00015       timer.record("Init");
00016 
00017       std::vector<typename id_pair<T>::vector> all_medoids(max_k * max_reps);
00018       trial_generator trials(max_k, max_reps, init_size, num_objects);
00019       run_pam_trials(trials, objects, dmetric, all_medoids, comm);
00020 
00021       // Make two arrays to hold our closest medoids and their distance from our object
00022       std::vector<double> all_dissimilarities(trials.count(), 0.0);           // dissimilarity sums
00023       std::vector< std::vector<medoid_id> > all_cluster_ids(trials.count());  // local nearest medoid ids
00024 
00025       std::vector<double> all_dissim2;      // dissimilarity sums squared
00026       std::vector<size_t> cluster_sizes;    // sizes of clusters in each trial
00027 
00028       // Go through all the trials again, and for each of them, find the closest 
00029       // medoid to this process's objects and sum the squared dissimilarities
00030       for (size_t i=0; i < trials.count(); i++) {
00031         const size_t num_medoids = all_medoids[i].size();
00032         for (size_t m=0; m < num_medoids; m++) {
00033           all_dissim2.push_back(0.0);
00034           cluster_sizes.push_back(0);
00035         }
00036         double *dissim2 = &all_dissim2[all_dissim2.size() - num_medoids];
00037         size_t *sizes   = &cluster_sizes[cluster_sizes.size() - num_medoids];
00038         
00039         for (size_t o=0; o < objects.size(); o++) {
00040           object_id global_oid = rank + o;
00041           std::pair<double, size_t> closest = closest_medoid(objects[o], global_oid, all_medoids[i], dmetric);
00042 
00043           all_dissimilarities[i]  += closest.first;
00044           dissim2[closest.second] += closest.first * closest.first;
00045           sizes[closest.second]   += 1;
00046           all_cluster_ids[i].push_back(closest.second);
00047         }
00048       }
00049       timer.record("FindMinima");
00050       
00051 
00052       // Sum up all the min dissimilarities.  We do a Reduce/Bcast instead of an Allreduce
00053       // to avoid FP error and guarantee that sums is the same across all processors.
00054       std::vector<double> sums(trials.count());         // destination vectors for reduction.
00055       std::vector<double> sums2(all_dissim2.size());
00056       std::vector<size_t> sizes(cluster_sizes.size());
00057 
00058       CMPI_Reduce(&all_dissimilarities[0],  &sums[0], trials.count(), MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, 0, comm);
00059       CMPI_Reduce(&all_dissim2[0], &sums2[0], sums2.size(), MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, 0, comm);
00060       CMPI_Bcast(&sums[0],  trials.count(), MPI_DOUBLE, 0, comm);
00061       CMPI_Bcast(&sums2[0], sums2.size(), MPI_DOUBLE, 0, comm);
00062       CMPI_Allreduce(&cluster_sizes[0], &sizes[0], sizes.size(), MPI_SIZE_T, MPI_SUM, comm);
00063       timer.record("GlobalSums");
00064 
00065       // find minmum global dissimilarity among all trials.
00066       std::vector<double>::iterator min_sum = std::min_element(sums.begin(), sums.end());
00067       total_dissimilarity = *min_sum;
00068       size_t best = (min_sum - sums.begin());  // index of best trial.
00069 
00070       // locally calculate the BIC for each trial
00071       size_t best_trial = 0;
00072       best_bic_score    = -DBL_MAX;
00073 
00074       size_t trial_offset = 0;  // offset into sizes array
00075       for (size_t i=0; i < trials.count(); i++) {
00076         size_t k = all_medoids[i].size();
00077         double cur_bic = bic(k, &sizes[trial_offset], &sums2[trial_offset], dimensionality);
00078         if (cur_bic > best_bic_score) {
00079           best_trial     = i;
00080           best_bic_score = cur_bic;
00081         }
00082         trial_offset += k;
00083       }
00084       
00085       best = best_trial;
00086 
00087       // Finally set up the partition to correspond to best trial found.
00088       medoid_ids.resize(all_medoids[best].size());
00089       for (size_t i = 0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00090         medoid_ids[i] = all_medoids[best][i].id;
00091       }
00092 
00093       // Make an indirection vector from the unsorted to sorted medoids.
00094       std::vector<size_t> mapping(medoid_ids.size());
00095       std::generate(mapping.begin(), mapping.end(), sequence());
00096       std::sort(mapping.begin(), mapping.end(), indexed_lt(medoid_ids));
00097       invert(mapping);
00098 
00099       // set up local cluster ids, medoids, and medoid_ids with the sorted mapping.
00100       for (size_t i=0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00101         medoid_ids[i] = all_medoids[best][mapping[i]].id;
00102       }
00103 
00104       // swap in the cluster ids with the best BIC score.
00105       cluster_ids.swap(all_cluster_ids[best]);
00106 
00107       // if the user wanted a copy of the medoids, copy them into the dstination array.
00108       if (medoids) {
00109         medoids->resize(medoid_ids.size());
00110         for (size_t i=0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00111           (*medoids)[i] = all_medoids[best][mapping[i]].element;
00112         }
00113       }
00114 
00115       timer.record("BicScore");
00116       return best_bic_score;
00117     }
